de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.text
Class AbstractTextShape

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.AbstractShape
      de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.other.RectangularShape
          de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.text.AbstractTextShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustableShape, Paintable, Shape, TextShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
IdentifierShape, RuleShape, TerminalShape
public abstract class AbstractTextShape
extends RectangularShape
implements TextShape

Common functionality for all shapes with text. A text shape has a text, an in and out line and some optional graphics (like rounded box for terminals or rectangular box for identifiers.). Schema of an identifier: 

                         inner box
                        /
    in line +--------------+   out line
   /        |              |  /
 -----------+  Identifier  +-----------
            |              |
            +--------------+

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
